name: Violent Bird Hunt
description:
Battle your friends in a test of skill and accuracy as you try to gloriously murder innocent birds in unnecessary fashion. (Sorry, PETA) This is inspired by the classic game we all know and love, but with a twist! Players are given assault rifles this time around. 

Shooting the rifle will induce screen shaking, screen flashing, and some rather loud audio.

Player 1 controls the blueish green crosshair and has the darker colored birds as their primary targets.

Player 2 controls the red crosshair and has the lighter colored birds as their primary targets.

Shoot your intended targets as they fly by in order to earn points! Be careful, you are able to shoot your enemy's targets as well, causing you to lose some points!

Violent Bird Hunt was made with the Nintendo Switch Joy-Cons in mind. The controls are as follows:

Player 1: (Right Joy-Con)

Joystick - Move

A - Shoot

SL/SR - Reload

Plus Button - Restart (After game has finished)

Player 2: (Left Joy-Con)

Joystick - Move

Left Directional Button - Shoot

SL/SR - Reload

Minus Button - Restart (After game has finished)
